scriptorium

📌 Scriptorium (Classes 8–12)
🗓️ Sunday, 17th August 2025 | ⏰ 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM
🎯 Format: English Creative Writing (Blended Genres)

ℹ️ Students compose an original 15-line piece blending a short story, monologue, and poem based on a given prompt.

📖 Sample Rules:
• Use the same prompt (word, phrase, or image).
• Output must blend 3 genres clearly in 15 lines.
• Entries must have a title.
...

🏆 Awards: Top 3 Writers, Critic’s Choice Award...

what is sensorium

ℹ️ About Sensorium:
Participants will interpret a multisensory prompt using creative expression across any format — from movement to mime to spoken word.
when is it
📅 Sensorium is scheduled on Monday, 18th August 2025 at 9:30 AM to 12:30 PM.
